# The `PassInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinfo">PassInfo</a> class - An instance of this class exists for every pass known by the system, and can be obtained from a live <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> by calling its <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/targetpassconfig-cpp/#a8fd5fd11f1d85fee7e28a197e915aa0d">getPassInfo()</a> method. <a href="#details">More...</a>

RegisterPass&lt;t&gt; template - This template class is used to notify the system that a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> is available for use, and registers it into the internal database maintained by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager">PassManager</a>. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass/#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinfo">PassInfo</a> class - An instance of this class exists for every pass known by the system, and can be obtained from a live <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> by calling its <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/targetpassconfig-cpp/#a8fd5fd11f1d85fee7e28a197e915aa0d">getPassInfo()</a> method.

These objects are set up by the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass">RegisterPass&lt;&gt;</a> template.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passinfo-h">PassInfo.h</a>.
